situation.title: Post Office
situation.meta_description: The post offices are open, but the opening hours are limited.

situation.title: Shoping
situation.meta_description: If you go shopping, follow the hygienic rules.

situation.title: Services
situation.meta_description: Providing service trades is not allowed at this time.

situation.title: Banks and insurance
situation.meta_description: Written or phone communication is preferred.

situation.title: Health resorts
situation.meta_description: It is only possible to offer rehabilitation and spa care that is at least partially funded from the public health insurance.

situation.title: Shopping malls
situation.meta_description: Only shops carrying essential goods will be open in shopping centers - especially grocery stores, pharmacies and drugstores.

situation.title: Wholesale
situation.meta_description: Wholesale is mainly intended for business owners shopping in relation to their business.

situation.title: Repair shops and after-sale services
situation.meta_description: Package delivery and courier services are allowed to operate.

situation.title: Delivery and courier services
situation.meta_description: Package delivery and courier services are allowed to operate.

situation.title: Driver's education
situation.meta_description: Driver's education is not in progress. Driving classes, theory lessons, and final exams are temporarily banned.

situation.title: E-shop
situation.meta_description: Pickup points and delivery services for online stores are allowed to operate.

situation.title: Fairs, markets, farmers markets
situation.meta_description: Sales in stands, marketplaces and farmers markets are banned. The only exception being markets and stands selling specific products.

situation.title: Theatre, film and other artistic performances
Photography
situation.meta_description: Photography is possible, even with professional photographers both inside and outside.

situation.title: Accommodations
situation.meta_description: The operation of hotels and other accommodation services is limited.
